    • checkNegativePrice

      public double checkNegativePrice(double price) throws NegativePriceException
      This checks for a negative price and throws an error
      Parameters:
      price - the price the user chose
      Returns:
      returns the price as a double
      Throws:
      NegativePriceException - the error when the price is actually less than 0
